built: search-research.sh: FTS5 research+archive search with snippet highlights, --phase/--conf filters
search-decisions.sh: FTS5 decision search with --agent/--phase filters
search-gaps.sh: FTS5 gap/issue search with --status/--sev/--phase filters
export-research-archive.sh: SQLite→JSONL export for backward compat
search-all.sh: unified RAG entry point across all FTS tables with type tags
dv: Used unit separator \x1f instead of tab for sqlite3 field delimiter to prevent bash read from collapsing empty fields
Created db-test-helper.bash with inline FTS5 schema since main schema.sql does not yet have workflow tables
Used heredoc with .output /dev/null to suppress PRAGMA output in search results
